WorkItem.Description:
You can test this by editing a trinket to add or remove spellpower. Calculated dps and threat do not change.
Â 
Soul Casket is a viable tanking trinket because of its 321 Mastery. It's off the GCD so I can't see any reason not to macro it to Avenging Wrath. The OnUse adds several hundred damage to Judgement and Avenger's Shield.
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtPaladin] Spellpower Does Not Contribute to Calculated DPS
